column2: b'@ShagwongS I had to buy more $CMO at the close today. Low $5.60s is too cheap. That is a 20+% discount to BV.... insanely cheap for that GSE mREIT.'

b'i think $TWO and $CMO probably best buys out  there being pure GSE  plays and fat discounts to BV and $NRZ in general given it will do something to create a market price for its #NewRez lender sub ( probably in Q1 ) . In CRE i like $RMRM with a new portfolio of loans made post'
b'got lifted out of some $CMO pfdE near open \n\nreinvested in $TWO and $IRM a little later on .......'

b"the $NLY $AGNC names go to 10-15% premiums to BV without doing secondaries because it will hurt NIM's . Its also evidence ( to me ) to buy $CMO $TWO and any GSE  mREITs at double digit discounts to TBV"

b"$TWO at $6.28 will show as at  15% disco to Q3 TBV

$CMO at $5.73 will show as 16% disco to Q3 TBV

my bet is these levels don't get seen again until next credit crisis /pandemic /markets disaster 

still pondering how Nierenberg buys #NewRez into this new Fortress SPAC ...."
